text: Marcus Salvius Otho (Marcus Salvius Otho Caesar Augustus, 28 April 32 â€“16 April 69 ) was a Roman military commander who became Roman Emperor in 69 CE. He led a coup against the Emperor Galba, but was defeated in a battle by Vitellius only eight weeks later. He took his own life after the battle. The year 69 was known as the Year of the Four Emperors. ==References== Category:32 births Category:69 deaths Category:1st-century Roman emperors
title: Marcus Salvius Otho
